history.proof: intros d. destruct d as [p a]. unfold dta_kill_non_coacc_lazy, dta_kill_non_coacc. unfold predta_kill_non_coacc_lazy, predta_kill_non_coacc. shelve.

exceptions.exn: In environment p : preDTA a : ad Unable to unify "dta (non_coacc_kill p (predta_coacc_states p a)) a" with "dta (non_coacc_kill p (predta_coacc_states_0 p a)) a".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall d : DTA, dta_kill_non_coacc_lazy d = dta_kill_non_coacc d

Premises:
dta_kill_non_coacc_lazy = fun d : DTA => match d with | dta p a => dta (predta_kill_non_coacc_lazy p a) a end : DTA -> DTA
dta_kill_non_coacc = fun d : DTA => match d with | dta p a => dta (predta_kill_non_coacc p a) a end : DTA -> DTA
Inductive DTA : Set := dta : preDTA -> ad -> DTA
DTA_main_state_correct_check_correct : forall d : DTA, DTA_main_state_correct d -> DTA_main_state_correct_check d = true
DTA_main_state_correct_check_complete : forall d : DTA, DTA_main_state_correct_check d = true -> DTA_main_state_correct d
dta_ref_ok_check_complete : forall d : DTA, dta_ref_ok_check d = true -> DTA_ref_ok d
dta_ref_ok_check_correct : forall d : DTA, DTA_ref_ok d -> dta_ref_ok_check d = true
DTA_rec : forall P : DTA -> Set, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
DTA_ind : forall P : DTA -> Prop, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
DTA_rect : forall P : DTA -> Type, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
predta_ref_ok_check_complete : forall d : preDTA, predta_ref_ok_check d = true -> preDTA_ref_ok d
predta_ref_ok_check_correct : forall d : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok d -> predta_ref_ok_check d = true
predta_ref_ok_check = fun d : preDTA => predta_ref_ok_check_0 d d : preDTA -> bool
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop := rec_empty : forall d : preDTA, liste_reconnait d prec_empty tnil | rec_consi : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd ->...-> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
preDTA_ref_ok = fun d : preDTA => forall (a : ad) (s : state) (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (b : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl b -> exists s0 : state, MapGet state d b = Some s0 : preDTA -> Prop
semantic_equiv_0_3 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a' : ad) (l : term_list) (n : nat), rec_term d a (app a' l) (S n) = true -> exists s : state, MapGet state d a = Some s
predta_kill_non_coacc_lazy = fun (d : preDTA) (a : ad) => non_coacc_kill d (predta_coacc_states_0 d a) : preDTA -> ad -> preDTA
predta_kill_non_coacc = fun (d : preDTA) (a : ad) => non_coacc_kill d (predta_coacc_states d a) : preDTA -> ad -> preDTA
DTA_ref_ok = fun d : DTA => match d with | dta p _ => preDTA_ref_ok p end : DTA -> Prop
dta_ref_ok_check = fun d : DTA => match d with | dta p _ => predta_ref_ok_check p end : DTA -> bool
DTA_main_state_correct = fun d : DTA => match d with | dta p a => addr_in_preDTA p a end : DTA -> Prop
DTA_main_state_correct_check = fun d : DTA => match d with | dta p a => match MapGet state p a with | Some _ => true | None => false end end : DTA -> bool
addr_in_preDTA = fun (d : preDTA) (a : ad) => exists s : state, MapGet state d a = Some s : preDTA -> ad -> Prop
reconnait = fun (d : DTA) (t : term) => match d with | dta p a => reconnaissance p a t end : DTA -> term -> Prop
dta_rec_term = fun (d : DTA) (t : term) => match d with | dta p a => rec_term p a t (essence t p) end : DTA -> term -> bool
rec_list_terms = fix rec_term (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (n : nat) {struct n} : bool := match n with | 0 => false | S k => match t with | app c l => match MapGet state d a with | Some lts => match MapGet prec_list lts c with | Some pre => rec_list_terms d pre l k | None => false end | None => false end end end with rec_list_terms (d : preDTA) (pre : prec_list) (l : term_list) (n : nat) {struct n} : bool := match n with | 0 => false | S k => match pre with | prec_cons st stp pre' => match l with | tnil => false | tcons hd tl => rec_list_terms d pre' l k || rec_term d st hd k && rec_list_terms d stp tl k end | prec_empty => match l with | tnil => true | tcons _ _ => false end end end for rec_list_terms : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> nat -> bool Argument scopes are [_ _ _ nat_scope]
rec_term = fix rec_term (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (n : nat) {struct n} : bool := match n with | 0 => false | S k => match t with | app c l => match MapGet state d a with | Some lts => match MapGet prec_list lts c with | Some pre => rec_list_terms d pre l k | None => false end | None => false end end end with rec_list_terms (d : preDTA) (pre : prec_list) (l : term_list) (n : nat) {struct n} : bool := match n with | 0 => false | S k => match pre with | prec_cons st stp pre' => match l with | tnil => false | tcons hd tl => rec_list_terms d pre' l k || rec_term d st hd k && rec_list_terms d stp tl k end | prec_empty => match l with | tnil => true | tcons _ _ => false end end end for rec_term : preDTA -> ad -> term -> nat -> bool Argument scopes are [_ _ _ nat_scope]
Sumbool.sumbool_of_bool : forall b : bool, {b = true} + {b = false}
Z.sgn_null : forall n : Z, n = 0%Z -> Z.sgn n = 0%Z
negb_true_iff : forall b : bool, negb b = true < -> b = false
eq_true_iff_eq : forall b1 b2 : bool, b1 = true < -> b2 = true -> b1 = b2
N.discr : forall n : N, {p : positive | n = N.pos p} + {n = 0%N}
N.eq_square_0 : forall n : N, (n * n)%N = 0%N < -> n = 0%N
MapGet_M2_bit_0_1 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad), N.odd a = true -> forall m m' : Map A, MapGet A (M2 A m m') a = MapGet A m' (N.div2 a)
MapGet_M2_bit_0_0 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad), N.odd a = false -> forall m m' : Map A, MapGet A (M2 A m m') a = MapGet A m (N.div2 a)
option_sum : forall (A : Type) (o : option A), {y : A | o = Some y} + {o = None}
Neqb_complete : forall n n' : N, (n =? n')%N = true -> n = n'
Z.succ_inj_wd : forall n1 n2 : Z, Z.succ n1 = Z.succ n2 < -> n1 = n2
N.lxor_eq : forall a a' : N, N.lxor a a' = 0%N -> a = a'
Nat.eqb_eq : forall n m : nat, (n =? m) = true < -> n = m
N.eq_mul_0 : forall n m : N, (n * m)%N = 0%N < -> n = 0%N \/ m = 0%N
Ascii.byte_of_ascii_of_byte : forall x : Byte.byte, Ascii.byte_of_ascii (Ascii.ascii_of_byte x) = x
orb_false_r : forall b : bool, b || false = b

```  
intros d.
destruct d as [p a].
unfold dta_kill_non_coacc_lazy, dta_kill_non_coacc.
simpl.
unfold predta_kill_non_coacc_lazy, predta_kill_non_coacc.
reflexivity.
```

original: intros d. destruct d as [p a]. unfold dta_kill_non_coacc_lazy, dta_kill_non_coacc. simpl. unfold predta_kill_non_coacc_lazy, predta_kill_non_coacc. reflexivity.
